modName: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment - Now Modular-
summary: This mod adds Crafting Equipment you can activate from your inventory!!
descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][FONT=Georgia][SIZE=5][COLOR=#00b0f0]Mony\'s Portable Crafting Equipment[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER][CENTER]

[SIZE=3][COLOR=#00b0f0]THIS MOD HAS BEEN UPDATED TO BE FULLY MODULAR so you can pick and choose what tools you want in YOUR GAME!

VIDEO IS OF VERSION 1.2 Currently.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER]


[youtube]2rDQW1DQI1Y[/youtube][/CENTER][CENTER]This mod adds Crafting Equipment you can activate from your inventory!![/CENTER][CENTER]You can choose which tools you want to have![/CENTER][CENTER]FULLY MODULAR[/CENTER][CENTER]Cookingpot,ArmorerHammer,Smelter,Anvil,CraftingKnife,EnchantingBook,PestleandMortar,Grindstone[/CENTER][CENTER]CRAFTING RECIPES HAVE CHANGED and WEIGHTS HAVE CHANGED.[/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#00b050](*Newest Update Information*)[/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER]Compatible with Dawnguard, Hearthfire, Dragonborn, and SkyRe THIS SHOULD NOT CONFLICT with ANY other mod, UNLESS it changes my scripts or models.[/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#00b0f0]Dawnguard/Hearthfire/Dragonborn and SkyRe ARE NOT REQUIRED [/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][COLOR=#00b050]Version 1.3 THE BIG CHANGE IS THIS MOD IS NOW MODULAR, that means you can choose which tools you want to have in your game or choose them all (CHANGED Weights and Crafting Recipes, Changed Smelter Model,  New Grindstone Model/texture (thanks to Viz) Please let me know if there is any bugs or changes that need to be made!)[/COLOR][/CENTER][CENTER][SIZE=3][COLOR=#ff0000]THIS MOD IS ALSO ON STEAM WORKSHOP!!! ENJOY!!![/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][CENTER][URL=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=126513100]Steam Workshop (Download Mirror)[/URL][/CENTER]
author: Monydragon

files.name: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1 old
files.fileName: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1 old-12171.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Added Activator References to CELL \"CTest\"
Created Cookingpot,ArmorerHammer,Smelter,Anvil,CraftingKnife,EnchantingBook,PestleandMortar,SharpeningWeel
Modified Models for Cookingpot,ArmorerHammer,Smelter,Anvil,CraftingKnife,EnchantingBook,PestleandMortar,SharpeningWeel
Added Leveled Vendor list (VendorTools)

files.name: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1-1 Old
files.fileName: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1-1 NEW-12171-1-1.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Model For Anvil (taken off the wooden base)
New model for Cooking Pot (Iron pot with handle and spoon)
Changed model for Sharpening Stone (Made .8 the size of a normal one)
Changed model for Smelter (made smaller) Looking for new model
Slight tweaks and bugfixes

files.name: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1-2 NEW
files.fileName: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1-2 NEW-12171-1-2.rar
files.changelogHtml:
Changed Smelter Model/GrindStone/Cooking Pot
Renamed: Portable Smithing Anvil To Portable Smithing Tools
Fixed Crashes with the models! / Fixed Merchants Stock To carry the items
Made DAWNGUARD READY!
Created Recipes to create the TOOLS!

files.name: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1-3 MODULAR
files.fileName: Monys Portable Crafting Equipment V1-3 MODULAR-12171-1-3.rar
files.changelogHtml:
This mod is NOW Completely Modular! Through the Nexus Mod Manager
Updated Models and Textures NEW smelter/anvil/grindstone/knife
REMOVED leveled lists (FOR NOW) I am having conflicts with other mods.
CLEANED file and TESTED
